document.heading: Energy Benchmarking Reporting Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2024

To amend, on a temporary basis, the Green Building Act of 2006 to delay the submission of benchmark and Energy Star statements of energy performance by privately-owned buildings to the Department of Energy and Environment from April 1, 2024, to July 1, 2024.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Energy Benchmarking Reporting Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2024".

section.text: Section 4(c)(2)(A)(ii)(I) of the Green Building Act of 2006, effective March 8, 2007 (D.C. Law 16-234; D.C. Official Code § 6-1451.03(c)(2)(A)(ii)(I)), is amended by striking the phrase "In 2011 only" and inserting the phrase "In 2011 and 2024 only" in its place.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Budget Director as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

para.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), and a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(1)).
This act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
